         <li id="cite_note-275"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-275">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">
           <link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r999302996"><cite id="CITEREFStrathdeeGavish,_H.Shannon,_W.Buchwald,_M.1992" class="citation journal cs1">Strathdee, C.A.; Gavish, H.; Shannon, W.; Buchwald, M. (1992). "Cloning of cDNAs for Fanconi's anemia by functional complementation". <i><a href="/wiki/Nature_(journal)" title="Nature (journal)">Nature</a></i>. <b>356</b> (6372): 763–767. <a href="/wiki/Bibcode_(identifier)" class="mw-redirect" title="Bibcode (identifier)">Bibcode</a>:<a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://ui.adsabs.harvard.edu/abs/1992Natur.356..763S">1992Natur.356..763S</a>. <a href="/wiki/Doi_(identifier)" class="mw-redirect" title="Doi (identifier)">doi</a>:<a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://doi.org/10.1038%2F356763a0">10.1038/356763a0</a>. <a href="/wiki/PMID_(identifier)" class="mw-redirect" title="PMID (identifier)">PMID</a>&nbsp;<a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="//pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/1574115">1574115</a>. <a href="/wiki/S2CID_(identifier)" class="mw-redirect" title="S2CID (identifier)">S2CID</a>&nbsp;<a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://api.semanticscholar.org/CorpusID:4250632">4250632</a>.</cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal&amp;rft.genre=article&amp;rft.jtitle=Nature&amp;rft.atitle=Cloning+of+cDNAs+for+Fanconi%27s+anemia+by+functional+complementation&amp;rft.volume=356&amp;rft.issue=6372&amp;rft.pages=763-767&amp;rft.date=1992&amp;rft_id=info%3Adoi%2F10.1038%2F356763a0&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fapi.semanticscholar.org%2FCorpusID%3A4250632%23id-name%3DS2CID&amp;rft_id=info%3Apmid%2F1574115&amp;rft_id=info%3Abibcode%2F1992Natur.356..763S&amp;rft.aulast=Strathdee&amp;rft.aufirst=C.A.&amp;rft.au=Gavish%2C+H.&amp;rft.au=Shannon%2C+W.&amp;rft.au=Buchwald%2C+M.&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3ACanada" class="Z3988"></span></span> </li>

         <li id="cite_note-BeaujotKerr2007j-289"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-BeaujotKerr2007j_289-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">

           <link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r999302996"><cite id="CITEREFTetteyPuplampu2005" class="citation book cs1">Tettey, Wisdom; Puplampu, Korbla P.          <li id="cite_note-424"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-424">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">
           <link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r999302996"><cite id="CITEREFKallmannPotvin2018" class="citation web cs1"><a href="/wiki/Helmut_Kallmann" title="Helmut Kallmann">Kallmann, Helmut</a>; Potvin, Gilles (February 7, 2018). <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.thecanadianencyclopedia.ca/en/article/o-canada">"O Canada"</a>. <i>Encyclopedia of Music in Canada</i>. <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20131203021353/http://www.thecanadianencyclopedia.com/en/article/o-canada/">Archived</a> from the original on December 3, 2013<span class="reference-accessdate">.          <li id="cite_note-440"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-440">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">
           <link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r999302996"><cite id="CITEREFPeterson2014" class="citation news cs1">Peterson, David (July 10, 2014). <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.theglobeandmail.com/globe-debate/why-toronto-should-get-excited-about-the-pan-am-games/article19543736/">"Why Toronto should get excited about the Pan Am Games"</a>. <i><a href="/wiki/The_Globe_and_Mail" title="The Globe and Mail">The Globe and Mail</a></i>. <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20200925011444/https://www.theglobeandmail.com/opinion/why-toronto-should-get-excited-about-the-pan-am-games/article19543736/">Archived</a> from the original on September 25, 2020.</cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal&amp;rft.genre=article&amp;rft.jtitle=The+Globe+and+Mail&amp;rft.atitle=Why+Toronto+should+get+excited+about+the+Pan+Am+Games&amp;rft.date=2014-07-10&amp;rft.aulast=Peterson&amp;rft.aufirst=David&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.theglobeandmail.com%2Fglobe-debate%2Fwhy-toronto-should-get-excited-about-the-pan-am-games%2Farticle19543736%2F&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3ACanada" class="Z3988"></span></span> </li> 
        </ol>
       </div>
      </div>

       <style data-mw-deduplicate="TemplateStyles:r956638175">@media all and (max-width:720px){.mw-parser-output .multicol-float{width:auto!important}}.mw-parser-output .multicol-float{width:30em;clear:none;float:left}.mw-parser-output .multicol-float-clear{clear:both}</style>

        <p><b>Overview</b> </p> 
        <ul>
         <li>
          <link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r999302996"><cite class="citation book cs1">Marsh, James H. (1999). <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://books.google.com/books?id=wR_-aSFyvuYC&amp;pg=PP1"><i>The Canadian Encyclopedia</i></a>. McClelland &amp; Stewart. <a href="/wiki/ISBN_(identifier)" class="mw-redirect" title="ISBN (identifier)">ISBN</a>&nbsp;<a href="/wiki/Special:BookSources/978-0-7710-2099-5" title="Special:BookSources/978-0-7710-2099-5"><bdi>978-0-7710-2099-5</bdi></a>.</cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook&amp;rft.genre=book&amp;rft.btitle=The+Canadian+Encyclopedia&amp;rft.pub=McClelland+%26+Stewart&amp;rft.date=1999&amp;rft.isbn=978-0-7710-2099-5&amp;rft.aulast=Marsh&amp;rft.aufirst=James+H.&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fbooks.google.com%2Fbooks%3Fid%3DwR_-aSFyvuYC%26pg%3DPP1&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3ACanada" class="Z3988"></span></li>
        </ul> 
        <p><b>Culture</b> </p> 
        <ul>
         <li>
          <link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r999302996"><cite class="citation book cs1"><a href="/wiki/Andrew_Cohen_(journalist)" title="Andrew Cohen (journalist)">Cohen, Andrew</a> (2007). <span class="cs1-lock-registration" title="Free registration required"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://archive.org/details/unfinishedcanadi00andr"><i>The Unfinished Canadian: The People We Are</i></a></span>.         <p><b>Government and law</b> </p> 
        <ul>
         <li>
          <link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r999302996"><cite class="citation book cs1">Jacob, Joseph W. (2007). <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://books.google.com/books?id=rIbBxDxmUHwC&amp;pg=PP1"><i>Canadian Charter of Rights and Freedoms: Democracy for the People and for Each Person</i></a>. Trafford Publishing. <a href="/wiki/ISBN_(identifier)" class="mw-redirect" title="ISBN (identifier)">ISBN</a>&nbsp;<a href="/wiki/Special:BookSources/978-1-4269-8016-9" title="Special:BookSources/978-1-4269-8016-9"><bdi>978-1-4269-8016-9</bdi></a>.</cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook&amp;rft.genre=book&amp;rft.btitle=Canadian+Charter+of+Rights+and+Freedoms%3A+Democracy+for+the+People+and+for+Each+Person&amp;rft.pub=Trafford+Publishing&amp;rft.date=2007&amp;rft.isbn=978-1-4269-8016-9&amp;rft.aulast=Jacob&amp;rft.aufirst=Joseph+W.&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fbooks.google.com%2Fbooks%3Fid%3DrIbBxDxmUHwC%26pg%3DPP1&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3ACanada" class="Z3988"></span></li> 
         <li>
          <link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r999302996"><cite class="citation book cs1">Malcolmson, Patrick; Myers, Richard (2009). <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://books.google.com/books?id=-jpXFH_ZhY8C&amp;pg=PP1"><i>The Canadian Regime: An Introduction to Parliamentary Government in Canada</i></a> (4th&nbsp;ed.). University of Toronto Press. <a href="/wiki/ISBN_(identifier)" class="mw-redirect" title="ISBN (identifier)">ISBN</a>&nbsp;<a href="/wiki/Special:BookSources/978-1-4426-0047-8" title="Special:BookSources/978-1-4426-0047-8"><bdi>978-1-4426-0047-8</bdi></a>.</cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook&amp;rft.genre=book&amp;rft.btitle=The+Canadian+Regime%3A+An+Introduction+to+Parliamentary+Government+in+Canada&amp;rft.edition=4th&amp;rft.pub=University+of+Toronto+Press&amp;rft.date=2009&amp;rft.isbn=978-1-4426-0047-8&amp;rft.aulast=Malcolmson&amp;rft.aufirst=Patrick&amp;rft.au=Myers%2C+Richard&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fbooks.google.com%2Fbooks%3Fid%3D-jpXFH_ZhY8C%26pg%3DPP1&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3ACanada" class="Z3988"></span></li> 
         <li>
          <link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r999302996"><cite class="citation book cs1">Morton, Frederick Lee (2002). <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://books.google.com/books?id=dj_4_H35nmYC&amp;pg=PP1"><i>Law, politics, and the judicial process in Canada</i></a>. Frederick Lee. <a href="/wiki/ISBN_(identifier)" class="mw-redirect" title="ISBN (identifier)">ISBN</a>&nbsp;<a href="/wiki/Special:BookSources/978-1-55238-046-8" title="Special:BookSources/978-1-55238-046-8"><bdi>978-1-55238-046-8</bdi></a>.</cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook&amp;rft.genre=book&amp;rft.btitle=Law%2C+politics%2C+and+the+judicial+process+in+Canada&amp;rft.pub=Frederick+Lee&amp;rft.date=2002&amp;rft.isbn=978-1-55238-046-8&amp;rft.aulast=Morton&amp;rft.aufirst=Frederick+Lee&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fbooks.google.com%2Fbooks%3Fid%3Ddj_4_H35nmYC%26pg%3DPP1&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3ACanada" class="Z3988"></span></li>
        </ul> 
        <p><b>History</b> </p> 
        <ul>
         <li>
          <link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r999302996"><cite class="citation book cs1">Careless, J. M. S. (2012). <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://books.google.com/books?id=mARx1-EGwR0C&amp;pg=PR1"><i>Canada: A Story of Challenge</i></a> (Revised&nbsp;ed.). Cambridge University Press. <a href="/wiki/ISBN_(identifier)" class="mw-redirect" title="ISBN (identifier)">ISBN</a>&nbsp;<a href="/wiki/Special:BookSources/978-1-107-67581-0" title="Special:BookSources/978-1-107-67581-0"><bdi>978-1-107-67581-0</bdi></a>.</cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook&amp;rft.genre=book&amp;rft.btitle=Canada%3A+A+Story+of+Challenge&amp;rft.edition=Revised&amp;rft.pub=Cambridge+University+Press&amp;rft.date=2012&amp;rft.isbn=978-1-107-67581-0&amp;rft.aulast=Careless&amp;rft.aufirst=J.+M.+S.&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fbooks.google.com%2Fbooks%3Fid%3DmARx1-EGwR0C%26pg%3DPR1&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3ACanada" class="Z3988"></span></li> 
         <li>
          <link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r999302996"><cite class="citation book cs1">Francis, RD; Jones, Richard; Smith, Donald B (2009). <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://books.google.com/books?id=GbbZRIOKclsC&amp;pg=PP1"><i>Journeys: A History of Canada</i></a>. Nelson Education. <a href="/wiki/ISBN_(identifier)" class="mw-redirect" title="ISBN (identifier)">ISBN</a>&nbsp;<a href="/wiki/Special:BookSources/978-0-17-644244-6" title="Special:BookSources/978-0-17-644244-6"><bdi>978-0-17-644244-6</bdi></a>.</cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook&amp;rft.genre=book&amp;rft.btitle=Journeys%3A+A+History+of+Canada&amp;rft.pub=Nelson+Education&amp;rft.date=2009&amp;rft.isbn=978-0-17-644244-6&amp;rft.aulast=Francis&amp;rft.aufirst=RD&amp;rft.au=Jones%2C+Richard&amp;rft.au=Smith%2C+Donald+B&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fbooks.google.com%2Fbooks%3Fid%3DGbbZRIOKclsC%26pg%3DPP1&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3ACanada" class="Z3988"></span></li> 
         <li>
          <link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r999302996"><cite class="citation book cs1">Taylor, Martin Brook; Owram, Doug (1994). <i>Canadian History</i>. <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://books.google.com/books?id=FamJrJEvymIC&amp;pg=PP1">1</a> &amp; <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://books.google.com/books?id=HKmAjZJCJFoC&amp;pg=PP1">2</a>. University of Toronto Press.</cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook&amp;rft.genre=book&amp;rft.btitle=Canadian+History&amp;rft.pub=University+of+Toronto+Press&amp;rft.date=1994&amp;rft.aulast=Taylor&amp;rft.aufirst=Martin+Brook&amp;rft.au=Owram%2C+Doug&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3ACanada" class="Z3988"></span> 
          <link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r999302996"><a href="/wiki/ISBN_(identifier)" class="mw-redirect" title="ISBN (identifier)">ISBN</a>&nbsp;<a href="/wiki/Special:BookSources/978-0-8020-5016-8" title="Special:BookSources/978-0-8020-5016-8">978-0-8020-5016-8</a>, 
          <link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r999302996"><a href="/wiki/ISBN_(identifier)" class="mw-redirect" title="ISBN (identifier)">ISBN</a>&nbsp;<a href="/wiki/Special:BookSources/978-0-8020-2801-3" title="Special:BookSources/978-0-8020-2801-3">978-0-8020-2801-3</a></li>
        </ul> 
        <p><b>Social welfare</b> </p> 
        <ul>
         <li>
          <link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r999302996"><cite class="citation book cs1">Finkel, Alvin (2006). <span class="cs1-lock-registration" title="Free registration required"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://archive.org/details/socialpolicyprac0000fink"><i>Social Policy and Practice in Canada: A History</i></a></span>. Wilfrid Laurier University Press. <a href="/wiki/ISBN_(identifier)" class="mw-redirect" title="ISBN (identifier)">ISBN</a>&nbsp;<a href="/wiki/Special:BookSources/978-0-88920-475-1" title="Special:BookSources/978-0-88920-475-1"><bdi>978-0-88920-475-1</bdi></a>.</cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook&amp;rft.genre=book&amp;rft.btitle=Social+Policy+and+Practice+in+Canada%3A+A+History&amp;rft.pub=Wilfrid+Laurier+University+Press&amp;rft.date=2006&amp;rft.isbn=978-0-88920-475-1&amp;rft.aulast=Finkel&amp;rft.aufirst=Alvin&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Farchive.org%2Fdetails%2Fsocialpolicyprac0000fink&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3ACanada" class="Z3988"></span></li> 
         <li>
          <link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r999302996"><cite class="citation book cs1">Thompson, Valerie D. (2015). <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://books.google.com/books?id=rd51BwAAQBAJ&amp;pg=PP1"><i>Health and Health Care Delivery in Canada</i></a>. Elsevier Health Sciences. <a href="/wiki/ISBN_(identifier)" class="mw-redirect" title="ISBN (identifier)">ISBN</a>&nbsp;<a href="/wiki/Special:BookSources/978-1-927406-31-1" title="Special:BookSources/978-1-927406-31-1"><bdi>978-1-927406-31-1</bdi></a>.</cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook&amp;rft.genre=book&amp;rft.btitle=Health+and+Health+Care+Delivery+in+Canada&amp;rft.pub=Elsevier+Health+Sciences&amp;rft.date=2015&amp;rft.isbn=978-1-927406-31-1&amp;rft.aulast=Thompson&amp;rft.aufirst=Valerie+D.&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fbooks.google.com%2Fbooks%3Fid%3Drd51BwAAQBAJ%26pg%3DPP1&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3ACanada" class="Z3988"></span></li> 
         <li>
          <link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r999302996"><cite class="citation book cs1">Burke, Sara Z.; Milewski, Patrice (2011). <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://books.google.com/books?id=apjYaExaI-QC&amp;pg=PP1"><i>Schooling in Transition: Readings in Canadian History of Education</i></a>. University of Toronto Press. <a href="/wiki/ISBN_(identifier)" class="mw-redirect" title="ISBN (identifier)">ISBN</a>&nbsp;<a href="/wiki/Special:BookSources/978-0-8020-9577-0" title="Special:BookSources/978-0-8020-9577-0"><bdi>978-0-8020-9577-0</bdi></a>.</cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook&amp;rft.genre=book&amp;rft.btitle=Schooling+in+Transition%3A+Readings+in+Canadian+History+of+Education&amp;rft.pub=University+of+Toronto+Press&amp;rft.date=2011&amp;rft.isbn=978-0-8020-9577-0&amp;rft.aulast=Burke&amp;rft.aufirst=Sara+Z.&amp;rft.au=Milewski%2C+Patrice&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fbooks.google.com%2Fbooks%3Fid%3DapjYaExaI-QC%26pg%3DPP1&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3ACanada" class="Z3988"></span></li>
        </ul>

                <th scope="row" class="navbox-group" style="width:1%"><a href="/wiki/Dependent_territory" title="Dependent territory">Dependencies</a><br>of Members</th>

                   <tr>
                    <th scope="row" class="navbox-group" style="width:1%">Australia</th>
